item.title: How NTP servers work
item.author: sanyia.saidova@gmail.com (Sanyia Saidova)
item.description: She still doesn’t know. Questions How are corrections made to a local block? How is it possible that NTP doesn’t skew the clock further when it makes the adjustment? Notes References A really detailed write up of NTP servers that I should condense

item.title: How to learn through digital media
item.author: sanyia.saidova@gmail.com (Sanyia Saidova)
item.description: She still doesn’t know. Questions Notes Because of the fact that digital media doesn’t make it easy to write in the margins, or create references to other material, it becomes hard to read syntopically through web articles or e-books. Mention tools/techniques that could help achieve syntopic reading through digital media People can learn through more than just reading via digital media, so how can that be factored into learning? References

item.title: The difference between a CNAME and ALIAS record
item.author: sanyia.saidova@gmail.com (Sanyia Saidova)

item.title: The difference between login, non-login, interactive and non-interactive shells
item.author: sanyia.saidova@gmail.com (Sanyia Saidova)
item.description: She still doesn’t know. Questions How is this distinguished by the OS? Is there a way for me to tell if I’m in a login/non-login interactive shell from my session? How do you tell the difference between an interactive/non-interactive shell? You can by checking for the existence of a prompt env var $PS1 Can you distinguish between an interactive/non-interactive shell in the same way across all Linux distros? When do the profile/rc files run with respective to each combination of login/non-login interactive/non-interactive shells?

item.title: How network interfaces work
item.author: sanyia.saidova@gmail.com (Sanyia Saidova)
item.description: She still doesn’t know. Questions What exactly are they? Are they a hardware device or can it be virtualised? If it’s virtualised, how can I create my own? How do network sockets relate to a network interface? Is the stuff that I wrote in the 20211228 time note correct? Notes On the 20211228 time note, I wrote some initial notes about them References Really good ELI5 explanation of a network socket Quora explanation
